website_summaries.verdict: Lock has 5 different ways you can access including fingerprint ID.
pros: You can grant limited access for certain people
Access through smartphone, keypad, ID card, fingerprint or key
Lock looks good and functions well
cons: The handle on this lock is not reversible
The lock is also not weatherproof

customer_reviews.title: Life have never been so easy! No more lost keys!
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile product, installation is not easy it took me around 2 hours. Functionality is pretty amazing. I recommend to using the thumb for the finger print reader. I have 3 small kids and the lock work without issues with theirs thumbs. It take some trial and error understanding the process of adding users but once you get it is pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap and waste of money. Stopped working and app doesn't connect half of time. No help from Amazon or seller or manufacturer. Very unhappy should have know made in China.
customer_reviews.author: dawnjay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Good support and price can't be beat. Just remember this is mostly for indoor or covered outdoor. Just saying!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended to buy
customer_reviews.text: The sound of the mechanism while lock & unlock is very high and noisy , it will make everyone in the house wakes up from its bad mechanism, i contacted the amazon which can't help me in this and forwarded me to the supplier who don't reply mails at all ,it is a waste of money Quality is poor , fingerprint scanner place is uncomfortable for using the thumb Quality is poor The box came broken and seems to be used
customer_reviews.author: Malik Chaabane

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Item does not work properly the app is very very slow. For instructions, no default codes,Technical support is nonexistent. Call to get technical support several times voicemail is always full
customer_reviews.author: Terrance H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: for setting fingerprints and PIN numbers I still have difficulties, I have tried the written method in the guide book but it still fails, for the material and through the bag I think it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Risko Leonardus

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product and support
customer_reviews.text: This door lock is very good, well made and works very nice. I have whole family regiatered and everybody is happy for not have to use keys anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cristiano Nunes

customer_reviews.title: This fingerprint door lock works great and it looks very cool
customer_reviews.text: This fingerprint door lock works great and it looks very cool. I bought it because I got sick and tired of my kids getting locked out of the house because they forgot their keys. I thought about buying a keypad door lock, but I was concerned the kids would share the number with their friends. Installation and fingerprint enrollment was a lot easier than I thought it would be. These fingerprint door locks are the future. I'm probably going to buy another fingerprint door lock for my office. I'm very happy with my purchase and highly recommend it..
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Reed

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works awesome so for
customer_reviews.text: Just get the lock installed .Looks nice and works awesome so for. The RFID cards that come with the package can be recognized really fast and the fingerprint works good. I have got all my family members enrolled by fingerprints. Now we can walk out without keys.
customer_reviews.author: XINYAO LU

customer_reviews.title: Before purchase, you should choose "open door" or "left open door". The thickness of the door is unsuitable for installation.
customer_reviews.text: The door lock with very high cost performance, easy to operate, the quality is very strong, safe, a variety of functions to unlock the way! The most important thing is to have a great after-sales service, and in yutobe there is also a tutorial to download!
customer_reviews.author: evafok

product_meta.title: ZKTeco TL400B Fingerprint Biometric Door Lock with APP Digital Keyless Bluetooth Locks Smart Home Entry + 5pcs RFID Cards,Left Handed
feature_bullets: 【Five ways to unlock】:World's First 5-in-1 Keyless Entry Smart Lock, Fingerprint + Code + Smartphone + ID Card + Key(Suggest Operation Temperature:>=32℉)

【Fit Doors】:Backset 2.16〃(55mm),Door thickness between 1.18〃(30mm) and 2.16〃(55mm),We suggest ask Locksmith to install this lock. Installation and Operating guide video:Search “ZKTeco TL400B ”on Youtube.
【Not Waterproof and Not Reversible】: Be careful when choose the left or right handle lever.This Lock is Not Waterproof and it's only for indoor use.
【Know who comes and goes】:A 24/7 activity log tracks who enters and exits your home. And with unique keys for each user, you’ll always know who opens your door and when.
【Convenient】: With New ZK SmartKey app solution ,share codes anytime anywhere, voice guide with adjustable volume, back up key for emergency,bluetooth 4.0 provide less consumption.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars25 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
